title: Tristana VU
body:
Honestly, I *really* like the VU. It fits her quite well, looks awesome and the voice is amazing.

I do have one question though.

Is the voice actress the same as Vi's? Because there are certain quotes (Tristana and Vi saying "nope" when using Buster shot and surviving {{champion:51}}'s Ace In the Hole, respectively) that sound exactly the same, just with a slightly different speaking tone.

Edit: 
I mean, seriously:
Tristana: http://images.wikia.com/leagueoflegends/images/8/8a/Tristana.spellR1.ogg
Vi: http://images.wikia.com/leagueoflegends/images/1/19/Vi.special3.ogg

Literally the same voice.

replies.body:
I love her walk style, I miss "I wanna shoot something" and hate how slow she is :>
Could use a tad bit of range I think.
